titleStmt.title: The modern conveyancer, or, Conveyancing improv'd being a choice collection of presidents [sic] on most occasions : drawn after the manner of conveyancing now in use, by the greatest hands of the present age, of which some are still living : consisting of settlements of estates upon marriages, &c. : with an introduction concerning conveyancing in general.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Richard and Ed. Atkyns, Esquires, for John Walthoe ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
